title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, September 21, 2021
description: Steven King celebrates his 74th birthday today. When asked why he writes, he said "The answer to that is fairly simple — there was nothing else I was made to do."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Steven King celebrates his 74th birthday today. When asked why he writes, he said "The answer to that is fairly simple — there was nothing else I was made to do."
itunes:summary: Steven King celebrates his 74th birthday today. When asked why he writes, he said "The answer to that is fairly simple — there was nothing else I was made to do."
